name: Kjell Borneland Foundation

address: Chhota Mechiya Busty, Near CNI Church

briefDescription: Kjell Borneland Foundation is a non profit organisation with an objective of sustainable development in environmental conservation, education and health sector. We are like-minded corporate professionals, technocrats and social workers, who would finance, handhold and support genuine grassroots' initiatives targeted at providing education, health and environmental developments to the deprived people of our area and the adjoining areas.
